title: I have a question on the new ancient coin changes
body: It specifies when nearby minions are killed by someone that isnt you, does this go towards minions? or do i need to have a competent adc that can farm so i can get gold now?

replies.body: Enemy minions killed by allied champions, allied towers or allied minions.

Meddler what are your thoughts to stop people from abusing this kind of item?
Last time a bunch of different champions jumped in the bot lane.
Can you make the support items work on jungle monsters too (or a lower statted version of them if needed)? It'd be interesting to have the duo go jungle be a possibility.

Since the current coin doesn't require it be champions, It seems logical to think it does not here either.

Spellthief used to have a component where the passive minion gold that was tied to it was based on whether your ADC successfully last hit the minion and it was removed for issues you are lamp shading right here, so i doubt they would go back to something they have agreed was a stupid idea.
Tying this into the general direction the post seems to be headed: what measures might be in place that would reduce the odds of the quest items being abused by non-support positions?
the current coin still gives you gold from minion vs minion kills so it doesnt look like thats changing at all
